attributes.action: Allow essiac tea in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Essiac is an herbal tea promoted as an alternative treatment for cancer and other illnesses. It is currently banned in the UK for reasons that are unknown. Includes the weed/plant Rumex Acetosella also known as Sheep's Sorrel. There have been many cases where the tea has supressed symptoms of cancer and other illnessess and one case of it actually curing cancer. We would like the government to allow the the tea into the UK so people can drink it and test its healing properties for Themselves.
